lyric.verse: Tobira wo akete Atarashii basho e Yasashii hitogomi wo Surinekete doko made mo Manmarui tsuki Ochike iku yuuhito deau Miageru sora wa Naniro ni somaru no Te no hira wa Kagayaku gin no hoshi hitotsu Utainagara Mukae ni iku kara ne Hashitte iku yo
lyric.chorus: Anata ga Miru de aroo kisekitachi Anata wo Tsutsumu kaze to umi to Yakitsukete Mienakunatte shimau hi wa Amari ni mo hayaku Yatte kuru kara
lyric.verse: Hitosashiyubi wo kazashite Mahoo wo kakete mite Me ni utsurubete wo Osorenai yoo ni Nakushimono wa Ikutsu no umi wo umeru daroo Konna fuu ni Aruite yukerunara Furi makanaide
lyric.chorus: Anata ga Miru de aroo kisekitachi Anata wo Tsutsumu kaze to umi to Yakitsukete Mienakunatte shimau hi wa Amari ni mo hayaku Yatte kuru kara
lyric.verse: Obotete Yoku hareta Aoi aoi ano asa wo Hitoride Hashiri naketa keshikitachi Kooshite Ude ni kuzumu uta to Aishiteru? Tatoekikoenai toshite mo Watashi wa koko de Te wo furu kara Yakitsukete Sono ashi de sono hitomi de Yakitsukete
